newsitem.title: UK: Ultraframe seeks London listing later this year.
newsitem.headline: Ultraframe seeks London listing later this year.

text.p: Britain's Ultraframe Group Ltd, a specialist designer and manufacturer of conservatory roofing systems, said on Monday it was seeking a listing on the London Stock Exchange later this year.
Based in Lancashire, northwest England, Ultraframe made pre-tax profits of 7.6 million stg in the year to September 30, 1996 on turnover of 42.4 million.

"The flotation will raise our profile, further enhance our standing and provide a basis for continued growth in the UK and overseas," said founder and executive vice-chairman John Lancaster in a statement.
Barclays de Zoete Wedd Ltd has been appointed sponsor and financial adviser, while BZW Securities Ltd has been appointed stockbroker.
